 It is no longer updated and is in read-only mode, but it serves yewtube.
 What Is to Be Done? For now it's here, then we'll see.
 Maybe I will remove everything related to yewtube :)

item.title: Thu, 20 Feb 2025 13:23:10 UTC
item.description:
mps-youtube-0.2.8-x86_64-10cf:  Removed.
  It has not been updated for some time. I wanted to replace it with yewtube,
  but it requires httpx < 0.28, which nvchecker needs though.
  I will do some testing and see what to do.
